about.title: About Me
about.description: Full Stack Web Developer with a unique background in Mechanical Engineering, bringing analytical problem-solving skills to software development. Recently completed an intensive coding bootcamp, mastering React.js, TypeScript, Python, and SQL. Seeking opportunities in Dublin's dynamic tech scene where I can contribute my technical expertise and innovative thinking to create impactful web solutions.
